string.name: cat_imageview_title
string.description: 展示图片视图组件的碎片页面标题 [字符限制=20]

string.name: cat_imageview_square
string.description: 将图片形状改为正方形的按钮标签 [字符限制=20]

string.name: cat_imageview_diamond
string.description: 将图片形状改为菱形的按钮标签 [字符限制=20]

string.name: cat_imageview_circle
string.description: 将图片形状改为圆形的按钮标签 [字符限制=20]

string.name: cat_imageview_description
string.description: 图片视图组件的简要说明 [字符限制=无]

resources.string: ShapeableImageView 组件支持为图片设置自定义形状。
